name: Love is on the Cloud
description:
If I don't have a heart, is my love just an illusion.  如果我没有心，是不是我的爱只是假象。

A first-person perspective platform game with a hidden narrative about a human and her synthetic lover, developed in Unreal Engine 4.

Controls:

Use WASD, Space to move around.

Use Mouse to change the perspective. 

Follow the other instructions in the game.

Press Ctrl to restart if there are issues. 

✨I am preparing a VR version!

This game is designed for the final @Synthetic Architecture.

Sound Credit:
